data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Bhandara, Maharashtra, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bhandara, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,172,533 lost people in  Bhandara, Maharashtra, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Bhandara, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Bhandara, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kapewar people.
Father, remind your church in Bhandara that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 13,203 believers in Bhandara, Maharashtra, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Bhandara. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

location.name: Bhandara
location.cities_list: Bhandāra, Tumsar, Pawni, Chicholi, Hīrāpur Hamesha
location.cities_list_w_pop: Bhandāra (90,183), Tumsar (43,218), Pawni (23,450), Chicholi (18,864), Hīrāpur Hamesha (6,069)
